summary: PWA manifest and install-related meta tags were added, a service worker was added and registered from App.tsx, and an in-app “Install on phone” help dialog was added in the Footer. However, the required icon image assets themselves are not shown as added in the diff summary (only referenced).

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the required PWA icon assets (at least 192x192 and 512x512, plus a maskable icon, and an Apple touch icon) at the referenced paths.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and index.html reference icon files under /assets/generated/, but the diff summary does not show any added image files for these required icons, so installability may be incomplete.
